alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 8:31PM CST until January 04 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Embarras River at Lawrenceville affecting Lawrence County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Embarras River at Lawrenceville. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Minor agricultural flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Monday the stage was 30.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM CST Monday was 30.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 20.3 feet Thursday, January 13. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Embarras River Lawrenceville 30.0 30.2 Mon 7 pm CST 28.6 26.5 25.0 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
